name: Supa Hot Fire
description:
Supa Hot Fire is a maze/ rage game where you have to find and reach the fire exits while maintaining a high heat level. 

At the start of each level you are allowed to explore the entirety of the maze without a character constraint. You can plan your path but bare in mind your heat level is constantly dropping if it reaches zero you die. When your mouse hovers over the game character you will then control it and wherever your mouse goes it will go. 

Do not touch any of the walls otherwise you will die. Flames increase your heat level and water droplets decrease your heat level. As you complete levels new mechanics will be introduced.

Can you be the first to complete all 5 levels!!!

This was my first ever game that was created years ago on Construct.
